review.title: “Very Poorly Managed by 2 puppets”
review.pros: Pros – None. I can't say anything positive about working for this company. It was a waste of my time working there.
review.cons: Cons – No benefits - work in a freezer at 15 below for hours. Employee morale very low. No direction. You bring up issues and they are disregarded. Communication very poor. They need to focus on their people skills.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Let your employees make decisions to make your company grow. Try to actually follow through on issues when they arise.
